title: FDE solarizes 100 schools
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 18 (APP):The Federal Directorate of Education (FDE) in partnership with the National Radio and Telecommunication Corporation (NRTC) has successfully completed the solarization of 100 schools.
The installation of solar panels will not only reduce carbon footprint but also provide a reliable and eco-friendly source of energy for our schools, said a press release.
It said that the initiative would have a positive impact on the educational environment and empower future generations to thrive in a sustainable world.
